title: Rainbow salad
ingredients: ['3 vine-ripened tomatoes, diced', '2 mangoes, peeled, seeded and cubed', '2 avocados, peeled, pitted and cubed', '1 orange pepper, chopped', '150g fresh blueberries', '1 red onion, chopped', '1/2 bunch coriander, chopped', '4 tablespoons fresh lime juice', '125ml pineapple juice']
